item.title: Hubris Is Undoing Trump’s Second Term
item.description: Trump has overestimated what he could achieve and underestimated the voters, allies, and legal grounding needed to make his accomplishments last.

item.title: The Case for Prudence over Principle, Then and Now
item.description: Edmund Burke’s spurned advice to Parliament in 1775 has found new relevance in Minneapolis.

item.title: Don’t Abuse the Word ‘Protester’
item.description: That’s not what Alex Pretti was.

item.title: Tom Homan’s Deft Handling of Mayor Frey’s Refusal to Enforce ‘Federal Immigration Laws’
item.description: He’s staying focused on creating a template for collaborative federal-local enforcement efforts.

item.title: Gavin Newsom Is Fooling No One
item.description: The California governor can hardly pretend to be a champion of free speech, gun rights, and life.
